response.original_title: Sonhei que atravessava um espelho como se fosse água
response.overview: Between pieces of everyday life, immersive images are inserted capturing the peculiarities and strangeness of a dream. In a compilation of scenes captured over the course of three years, time becomes incomprehensible, confusing and tangled. Illusions and reflections become confused and fused. A woman represents herself in her pain andher  attempts to break from what is expected of her. In its non-linearity, the video also creates a narrative in which reality and mental fantasies reach a point of indiscernibility.
response.title: Sonhei que atravessava um espelho como se fosse água
